title: YAM Feedback Form
description: We value your opinion and would love to hear your thoughts about our yoga community. This survey will take approximately 10 minutes to complete. Thank you for your time!

fields.title: Welcome to YAM Feedback Form
fields.description: We are trying to understand our community better. Your feedback will help us improve and grow. There's a reward at the end if you choose to share your email with us!

fields.question: What is your relationship with YAM?
Do you practice yoga?
fields.description: This question is for those who are not yet customers.

fields.question: What factors are important to you when choosing a yoga studio?
How did you find out about YAM?
How would you rate your overall experience with YAM?
fields.description: 1 being the worst and 5 being the best.

fields.question: Why did you stop attending YAM?
Would you like to enter our reward draw? If so, please enter your email address.
fields.description: This is optional and your email will only be used for the purpose of the draw.

fields.title: Thank you for your feedback!
fields.description: Your feedback is valuable to us and will help us improve our community. If you have entered the reward draw, we will contact you if you are the winner. Namaste!
